chapters.title: Chapter 12: A Bargain
chapters.info: Shielyn din Sabura Night Waters, p. 311 (369)—Windfinder to Zaida, wavemistress of Clan Catelar. She is slender and cooly reserved. She is almost as tall as Aviendha. Like all Windfinders to Clan Wavemistresses, she wears eight earrings on one ear.
